content: संगमः {@--1@} Meeting, union; <ls>V. 4. 37</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 66</ls>, <ls n="R. 12.">90.</ls> {@--2@} Association, company, society, intercourse; as in सद्भिः संगमः. {@--3@} Contact, touch; गात्रसंगमात् <ls>R. 8. 44.</ls> {@--4@} Sexual union or intercourse; अयं स ते तिष्ठति संगमोत्सुकः <ls>Ś. 3. 14</ls>; <ls>R. 19. 33.</ls> {@--5@} Confluence (of rivers); गंगायमुनयोः संगमे <ls>V. 5.</ls> {@--6@} Fitness, adaptation. {@--7@} Encounter, fight. {@--8@} Conjunction (of planets).
